comment: I had to drop her courses. She gave awful confusing instructions. I tried contacting her for for weeks and she never once returned an email or call. She just gave me bad grades and refused to say why. I tried to work it out but had to make the school let me drop due to her ignoring all the students. (I spoke to other students who had same problems)

SHE IS TERRIBLE, HAVE NO INTEREST ON HELPING EVEN WHEN ASKED FOR GUIDANCE. TERRIBLE TEACHING METHODS, HER JOKES ARE IRRELEVANT TO WHAT SHE TEACHES AND NOT FUNY. SHE IS SO BORING IN HER LECYURES AND VERY UNFAIR AS OF HER RULES AND CARELESS ON GRATING PAPER ONTIME BUT WILL NOT FAILED TO GIVE ZERO FOR TURNING PAPER LATE WITHOUT ANY CONSIDERATION.
